function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentrations of formaldehyde and toluene in the built environment","Impact":"Health risks to occupants, potential for respiratory issues and other health complications","Mitigation":"Implement effective air filtration systems and outdoor air ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Botanical air filtration systems, HVAC integration, outdoor air filtration","People":"Occupants of commercial buildings, workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, HVAC system installers"},{"Description":"Inadequate outdoor air ventilation","Impact":"Increased concentration of indoor pollutants, poor indoor air quality, increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air ventilation rates, improve air filtration systems, implement air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Outdoor air ventilation systems, air quality sensors, filtration systems","People":"Occupants of commercial buildings, workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, HVAC system installers"},{"Description":"Dependence on specific pollutants for outdoor air ventilation rate determination","Impact":"Inefficient ventilation strategies, potential neglect of other harmful pollutants, limited flexibility in ventilation system design","Mitigation":"Diversify outdoor air ventilation rate determination methods, consider a wide range of indoor pollutants in ventilation rate calculations","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, pollutant detection systems, flexible ventilation control systems","People":"Building design engineers, HVAC system designers","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"}]}
